title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 13, ch. III, pt. 50 - THEATRICAL FINANCING
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 13, ch. III, pt. 50 - THEATRICAL FINANCING
State Regulations
§ 50.1 - General provisions
§ 50.2 - Contents of investment agreements
§ 50.3 - Contents of offering literature for a particular specified production filed pursuant to section 50.1(n)(1) of this Part in connection with an offer to fund a particular specified production
§ 50.4 - Additional contents of offering literature filed pursuant to section 50.1(k)(1) of this Part in connection with an offering for a theatrical production company which will use the proceeds for more than one production or for one or more nonspecified productions
§ 50.5 - Amended offering literature
§ 50.6 - Method of filing offering literature other than that filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission, as referred to in section 50.1(m) of this Part
§ 50.7 - Exhibits and documents to be submitted to the Department of Law
§ 50.8 - Abandonment or withdrawal

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 13, ch. III, pt. 50

Statutory authority: Arts and Cultural Affairs Law, art. 23

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
